website_summaries.verdict: Your cat can wear its harness in comfort with the plush material. Vest is extremely easy to put on the cat, as long as you order correct size.
pros: Thicker, softer material than most other cat harnesses
Customers say their pet can wear this for long periods of time
cons: With Velcro design, some cats could find a way to wiggle out of the harness
Customers say sizes run too large for cats

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Fantastic Service
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 mesh style harnesses from Voyager which have been perfect for my french bulldog Barley. With the weather getting colder, I purchased a Chocolate Latte harness, which is made of suede material. It keeps him a bit warmer and looks great as well. I originally ordered/received the wrong size in the mail, but Andrea in customer service responded promptly to my message and immediately mailed the size that I needed. Barley is 20 lbs and a Medium fits him well. I am very satisfied with the quality and durability of this harness. I'll be grabbing another Voyager harness soon in a different color/style and without hesitation, I easily recommend Voyager collars/harnesses to others as well.
customer_reviews.author: GSI

customer_reviews.title: Large fits 16.5 lb Shih Tzu perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting the quality to be so good for the price. The chocolate suede is very soft and goes great with his brown and white color hair. There is an adjustable velcro strap to custom fit to your dog. If you've never used a harness before, you want it snug enough so it won't pull forward when you walk your dog. If you have it too loose, it'll rub against their front legs and be uncomfortable. You want just enough room to fit 2 fingers under the harness. The benefit to a harness over a collar is you won't choke your dog. The pull from the leash gets distruputed over the chest area.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my 18 pound boston terrier who's neck and armpits are super sensitive.The inside fabric is nice and soft as are the edges. fabric. After a nice long walk her skin was not irritated. The only reason I did not give 5 stars was the fit. Although it seems very comfortable, it hits her a little high in the girth. A little lower (1 to 2 inches) towards the belly would be perfect. I ordered the large and will probably order a few more in the other colors 👍
customer_reviews.author: T. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Soft, Warm
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I measured our pup and ordered accordingly. She looks so cute in this. Recommended, as long as you know how to measure your pet. These seem to run smaller than normal harnesses. Our pet would normally be a small/medium but we ordered a large in this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: That when I order same size and style different color the fit is same. This vest must be medium.
customer_reviews.text: Too much trouble to return to kohl’s store being in wheelchair and all. Should not have to return this item. Your company made error making this vest too small. Just want xl .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dog harness for my 20 lb basenji. I don’t think it would fit a dog much larger. This is going to last a long time. Already washed in machine several times and it still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra  San Priest

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LOOK & QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Love this inexpensive and gorgeous harness! The only thing I didn't like is it goes a little high on his neck when he pulls (not bad though). In hindsight, I should have ordered the next size up. Great quality and I definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: A very reliable product! The material is rugged and strong, the velcro is super secure leaving no chance of him taking it off. My 7-year-old poodle loves to tug on the leash so this was a perfect match! The big space around the armpits makes sure he doesn't hurt himself there. He loves it so much he even sleeps with it on!
customer_reviews.author: Maria F. Waddoups

customer_reviews.title: This was nice, but don't let the size L fool you ...
customer_reviews.text: This was nice, but don't let the size L fool you --it's not for large dogs! it's for tiny dogs and the large will not actually fit a large dog. Make sure you pay attention to the measurements...Luckily the customer service was fantastic though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: No Pull?  Don't think so!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made comfortable vest, but it certainly is not a "no pull" vest. I have a 22 pound King Charles Cavalier dog who is now a year old, and she can pull me down the street like a sled dog with this vest on. Doesn't discourage her in the least.
customer_reviews.author: drf7731

customer_reviews.title: Not good for escape artist!
customer_reviews.text: My small terrier can just get out of this while on the leash. Like it - can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: tropical 85

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't measure up....but I like the harness.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars because I love the harness.....but it is smaller than what it says, and I measured twice. I ordered a larger size, hopefully that will work out. If not, two harnesses to the rescue!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size. Bought one small and one medium for both of our dogs and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Best dog harness for walking and riding in car. Easy on and off. Soft and does not cut into dogs chest, underarms, neck.
customer_reviews.author: Nanook

customer_reviews.title: good color and good size/fit for my terrier
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric, good color and good size/fit for my terrier. Waiting for cooler weather to walk him with the new harness. I live in Phoenix and the vest will be too warm during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: It was great, but my error with the size, I guess. I need to reoder and go down a size, runs big. But, then, it could just be the dogs awkward build. Still want to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, comfortable and secure!
customer_reviews.text: Fit our little 22lb Frenchie perfectly...super easy to get on and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Dog Harness
customer_reviews.text: Love this harness. So easy to put on and prevents her from choking.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Best harnesses for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off and very secure. Love these harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and pretty. I bought it for my shi-tzu and he looks great in it.
customer_reviews.author: Potter_Silva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit for the pooch.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my cocker spaniel. No more tugging on her neck and she loves the easy on.
customer_reviews.author: Murie

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 42lb Wheaton and could not get the xl to fit.
customer_reviews.author: JoMomma

customer_reviews.title: They were very soft and poked comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large and a medium. They were very soft and poked comfortable.....they were both so tiny they may work for a cat or young puppy. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: RLDW

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is thick, yet very soft.  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my psycho dog..velcro & plastic latch. Very strong & comfortable for her
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: It fits fine, but our dog's hair gets caught in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine, but our dog's hair gets caught in the clasp and it's noisy. When she shakes the clasp clatters.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Is not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my chocolate lab size large... it fit my 13lb shitzu like a glove.. not true to size at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's comfty for my cocker spaniel
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect, really easy to put and take of from your pet, for the price it's very worth it. If you need 1 for your pet this is def one to try. Not the best not the worst just right
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Runs small so make sure you measure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price and looks so adorable on my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kepes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comfortable harness
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comfortable harness. Very easy to put on, buy the right size since it is not adjustable. The large fits my 20 pound cockerpoo perfectly. Quick shipment
customer_reviews.author: D. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness
customer_reviews.text: Great harness for the colder months. Lots of nice warm coverage on the chest and back. Use the sizing chart and measure your dog first though because my small dog needed a large size and I was surprised but it fits perfectly. I would use this harness in the cooler months though. It is well made and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Bee Well

customer_reviews.title: best dog harness
customer_reviews.text: I tried several harnesses for my dacshund. This one was by far the best! It is so easy to slip him into it. My dog chewed through othe ones that were thin and uncomfortable. Another bonus is that it actually helps keep him warm this time of year!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Simmons

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: cozy harness that fits well and keeps my pooch safe
customer_reviews.author: s brazil

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are extremely off
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I have 2 Australian Shepherds one just a puppy 7 month old male and the other full grown female. I bought both a large thinking my puppy would still have to grow into his. Until I tried putting it on him and the Velcro scraps wouldn't go further then the sides of his body. Just for good assurance I tried it on my female and again the scraps wouldn't come further then the sides of their body. I don't know what large size animal they are referring to it sure isn't a dog!
customer_reviews.author: Zane Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: I'm forced to use it but it's pretty snug on my doggy
customer_reviews.text: These are so misleading. They are for tiny dogs! I have a jack russell terrier and bought the large. They are tight but I couldn't return them after first use since his hair is now all over it. I'm forced to use it but it's pretty snug on my doggy.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Craig

customer_reviews.title: What a joke!
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. Size large does not fit my pug. He is not overweight and besides that I measured per the instructions. I am ticked. He needs an extra large. I don't think these would even come close to fitting a boxer as shown on the hang tag. Don't be deceived if you have a big dog, these don't fit small or medium dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: it was more like a stuffed animal harness
customer_reviews.text: Way too small, it was more like a stuffed animal harness.
customer_reviews.author: leah Warren

customer_reviews.title: Greatest collar for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is the best collar. I have bought so many and never liked them. I have 3 dogs and bought each one. They are smaller pug size. So easy to put on. Velcro makes it adjustable. Doesn't looks uncomfortable, nice amd plush. Not going to come off unless u take it off. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for medium dog size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my medium super energetic dog. Soft and gentle on puppy, mummy happy!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it for my small dog. Does not seem to fit the dogs legs properly and when I walk her she seems uncomfortable the way it rides her upper legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy F

product_meta.title: Voyager Step-in Plush Dog Harness - Soft Plush, Step in Vest Harness for Small and Medium Dogs by Best Pet Supplies
product_meta.description: Size:Large (Chest: 18" - 21")| Color:Chocolate SuedeSAME BEST-SELLING QUALITY; FRESH NEW LOOK Shopping around for a step-in dog harness your furry buddy will love? Then treat them to one that’s already gotten the nod of approval from a great deal of customers! Our Voyager step-in dog harness is cherished by pet lovers for its soft lining and plush wrapping that turns up the comfort, and the step-in design that makes getting your pup walk-ready a breeze. Now our new line adds refreshed style into the mix with 2-fabric combo. You have the choice between faux leather with velvet inner lining, and ‘plush cotton’ that combines a cotton-feel polyester surface with fleece inner lining. Pick the color that matches your pet’s personality and make your next walk the snazziest one yet. Here’s what sets apart this dog walking harness from the rest: - Never puts any strain on your dog’s neck like others do. - Padded design and non-irritating lining ensures all-day comfort. - Step-in design is perfect for dogs that hate putting harnesses over their head. - Has a heavy-duty D-ring, secure hook & loop attachment, and strong buckles. - Comes in x-small, small, medium, large, and x-large to suit most breeds. - Easily washable for hassle-free maintenance. - Backed by a 100% customer satisfaction guarantee. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now to walk your pup with enhanced comfort and unique style completely risk-free!
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: Our best-selling dog walking harness never puts any pressure on your pup’s neck. Extra-soft inner lining and plush wrapping makes every walk a comfy treat.
NO-HASSLE WEAR: Take the stress out of walking your pooch with this step-in dog harness. Just get them step in with their 2 front legs, fasten the hook & loop, clasp the buckle, and you’re done.
WALK THEM WITH STYLE: Whether you have a thing for faux leather or plush cotton, our dog vest harness line gives you multiple color options to step out in head-turning style.

STAY IN CONTROL: You’ll love the heavy-duty metal D-ring that always keeps the leash securely attached. This padded pet harness comes in 5 size options to suit different sized dogs. Please be sure to measure your dogs before purchasing to get the perfect fit!
BUY RISK-FREE: Every Voyager dog chest harness is backed by a 100% satisfaction guarantee. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now to walk your four-legged pal with more comfort completely risk-free!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
